items.name: notion-blog
items.title: Notion Blog CMS
items.description: A complete blog system powered by Notion. Includes blog listing with pagination, individual post pages, tag filtering, table of contents, syntax highlighting, and full-featured content rendering. Built with Next.js App Router, React Server Components, and Fumadocs UI.
items.docs:
## Setup Instructions

### 1. Install the Component

```bash
npx shadcn@latest add https://notion-as-cms.github.io/r/notion-blog.json
```

This will:
- Install all required dependencies
- Create components in `components/blog/`
- Create library utilities in `lib/`
- Create type definitions in `types/`
- Create example app pages in `app/blog/`
- Generate a `.env.example` file

### 2. Configure Notion Integration

1. **Create a Notion Integration:**
   - Go to https://www.notion.so/my-integrations
   - Click "+ New integration"
   - Give it a name (e.g., "My Blog")
   - Copy the "Internal Integration Token"

2. **Create your databases:**
   
   **Blog Posts Database** with these properties:
   - Name (title)
   - Description (rich_text)
   - Slug (rich_text)
   - Date (date)
   - Author (people)
   - Tags (relation to Tags database)
   - Published (status with "Done" option)
   
   **Tags Database** with these properties:
   - Name (title)
   - Slug (rich_text)

3. **Share databases with your integration:**
   - Open each database in Notion
   - Click "..." â†’ "Add connections"
   - Select your integration

4. **Get database IDs:**
   - Open each database as a full page
   - Copy the ID from the URL: `notion.so/{workspace}/{DATABASE_ID}?v=...`

### 3. Configure Environment Variables

Create a `.env.local` file:

```bash
NOTION_API_KEY=secret_xxxxxxxxxxxxx
NOTION_BLOG_DATABASE_ID=xxxxxxxxxxxxx
NOTION_TAG_DATABASE_ID=xxxxxxxxxxxxx
```

### 4. Add Required Styles

Add react-notion-x styles to your global CSS:

```css
@import 'react-notion-x/src/styles.css';
@import 'prismjs/themes/prism-tomorrow.css';
```

### 5. Usage

The catch-all route at `app/blog/[[...slug]]/page.tsx` handles:
- `/blog` - Blog listing (paginated)
- `/blog/page/2` - Pagination
- `/blog/{slug}` - Individual posts
- `/blog/tag/{tag-slug}` - Posts by tag
- `/blog/tag/{tag-slug}/page/2` - Tag pagination

### 6. Customization

**Change posts per page:**
Edit `lib/constants.ts`:
```typescript
export const POSTS_PER_PAGE = 6; // Change from default 3
```

**Customize styling:**
All components use Tailwind CSS and are fully customizable.

**Modify blog routes:**
Edit the basePath in `app/blog/[[...slug]]/page.tsx` to change from `/blog` to another path.

### 7. Build and Deploy

```bash
npm run build
```

The blog will be statically generated at build time using Next.js ISR.
